name: Street Smart Game
description:
The objective of the "Street Smart Game" is to allow children to learn to care for themselves in a skillful and creative way while safely arriving back home.

As a mother of three and a grandmother of seven, keeping my family safe has always been my top priority and now I would like to create more awareness and share some strategies with the rest of the world. The "Street Smart Game" is for children aged 3 and older to play on their own and with their parents. We created this game because crime and the threat of violence on city streets, the suburbs, schools, places of business and in the home is at an all-time high and the need to educate our young children and youth about childhood danger is greater than ever before. When crime is learned from early years, it becomes a part of nature. We believe that the "Street Smart Game" app develops awareness of dangerous situations by introducing virtual life lessons in a child's early years of development. Becoming street smart allows for learning, understanding, and developing awareness of dangerous situations. The life lessons developed while interacting with the "Street Smart Game" app are invaluable tools of protection to develop the awareness required to become a part of your child's equipment for a good life.

The mission of Street Smart LLC is to:
          1.  Educate children about how to avoid being victimized by a childhood predator.
          2.  Educate parents on how to teach their children good safety habits.
          3.  Involve families and allow for a safe interaction while children learn how to be aware of their surroundings.
          4.  Identify potential dangers that exist in the world today.

I hope you see the value of our mission to raise awareness of stranger danger, to arm children with the tools they need to recognize unsafe situations, and to become "STREET SMART".
